設定主機信任 TrustedHosts

Set-Item WSMan:\localhost\Client\TrustedHosts -Value "192.168.6.88"

Set-Item WSMan:\localhost\Client\TrustedHosts -Value "192.168.6.81,192.168.6.82,192.168.6.83"

Set-Item WSMan:\localhost\Client\TrustedHosts -Value "*"
Set-Item WSMan:\localhost\Client\TrustedHosts -Value "192.168.6.81,192.168.6.82,192.168.6.83,192.168.6.84,192.168.6.85,192.168.6.86,192.168.6.87,192.168.6.88,192.168.6.89,192.168.6.90,192.168.6.91,192.168.6.92,192.168.6.111,192.168.6.112,192.168.6.113,192.168.6.114,192.168.6.115,192.168.6.116,192.168.6.117,192.168.6.118,192.168.6.119,192.168.6.120,192.168.6.121,192.168.6.122,192.168.6.61,192.168.6.62,192.168.6.63,192.168.6.64,192.168.6.65,192.168.6.66,192.168.6.67,192.168.6.68,192.168.6.69,192.168.6.70,192.168.6.71,192.168.6.72"
